quote: Write because you love to write.
author: Cindi Lee

quote: The desire to write grows with writing.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: I write because I cannot NOT write.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: Write only if you cannot live without writing. Write only what you alone can write.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: A writer always writes.
author: Don Roff

quote: I hate writing, I love having written.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: You either have to write or you shouldn't be writing. That's all.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The thing I write will be the thing I write.
author: Steve Shilstone

quote: Writing is like sex. First you do it for love, then you do it for your friends, and then you do it for money.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: There's nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and open a vein.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: We do not write because we want to; we write because we have to.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Every writer I know has trouble writing.
author: Joseph Heller

quote: Writing is a way of talking without being interrupted.
author: Jules Renard

quote: If you want to be a writer-stop talking about it and sit down and write!
author: Jackie Collins

quote: Perform the act of writing as often as possible.
author: Secli G

quote: Writers write while dreamers procastinate.
author: Besa Kosova

quote: Writing is the thing that props me up.
author: Horton Foote

quote: Writing comes more easily if you have something to say.
author: Sholem Asch

quote: Some writers enjoy writing, I am told. Not me. I enjoy having written.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: Write what you know.
author: Mark Twain,  The Adventures of Tom Sawyer & Adventures of Huckleberry Finn

quote: Writing is a delicious agony.
author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quote: Writing is really a way of thinking--not just feeling but thinking about things that are disparate, unresolved, mysterious, problematic or just sweet.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: Writing is an exploration. You start from nothing.
author: E.L. Doctorow

quote: If you have not done things worthy of being written about, at least write things worthy of being read.
author: Giacomo Casanova

quote: Being a writer is a very peculiar sort of a job: it's always you versus a blank sheet of paper (or a blank screen) and quite often the blank piece of paper wins.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Writing is magic, as much the water of life as any other creative art. The water is free. So drink. Drink and be filled up.
author: Stephen King

quote: Writing- the profession in which you stare at a computer screen, stare out the window, type a few words, then curse repeatedly.
author: Drew Goodman

quote: Writing's a lot like cooking. Sometimes the cake won't rise, no matter what you do, and every now and again the cake tastes better than you ever could have dreamed it would.
author: Neil Gaiman,  Fragile Things: Short Fictions and Wonders

quote: Don't write to sell, write to tell.
author: Jonas Eriksson

quote: If you want to be a writer, you must do two things above all others: read a lot and write a lot.
author: Stephen King

quote: Writing is a job, a talent, but it's also the place to go in your head. It is the imaginary friend you drink your tea with in the afternoon.
author: Ann Patchett,  Truth and Beauty

quote: The first thing you have to know about writing is that it is something you must do everyday. There are two reasons for this rule: Getting the work done and connecting with your unconscious mind.
author: Walter Mosley

quote: A book comes and says, 'Write me.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Writing is the voices inside our heads, our minds, the creativity that exists for us to, from nothing, create alternate worlds, manipulate a personality or to introduce a new kind of love, a new kind of hate or pain or happiness or wonder or... anything we want. Through words, we can do, we can be anything we want.
author: Allie Burke

quote: Writing is a dying form. One reads of this every day.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: I think all writing is a disease. You can't stop it.
author: William Carlos Williams

quote: Never put off writing until you are better at it.
author: Gary Henderson

quote: Writing is prayer.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Shut up and write.
author: K.A. Laity

quote: Writing is the geometry of the soul.
author: Plato

quote: Be a great writer when you write your life's song.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A writer is someone for whom writing is more difficult than it is for other people.
author: Thomas Mann,  Essays of Three Decades

quote: Writing is like prostitution. First you do it for love, and then for a few close friends, and then for money.
author: Molière

quote: So long as you write what you wish to write, that is all that matters; and whether it matters for ages or only for hours, nobody can say.
author: Virginia Woolf,  A Room of One's Own

quote: Writing is a dog’s life, but the only one worth living.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Writing is a form of therapy; sometimes I wonder how all those who do not write, compose, or paint can manage to escape the madness, melancholia, the panic and fear which is inherent in a human situation.
author: Graham Greene,  Ways Of Escape

quote: Writing is the only thing that when I do it, I don't feel I should be doing something else.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Writing is like going underwater - thank you for being there when I come back up.
author: Ali Shaw,  The Girl With Glass Feet

quote: Write because you love it and not because it is something that you think you should do. Always write about something or somebody you know about - something that you feel deeply and passionately about. Never try and force it.
author: Michael Morpurgo
